song.eTitle: Lord, Whose Love in Humble Service

verses.verse: Lord, whose love in humble service Bore the weight of human need, Who upon the cross, forsaken, Worked Your mercy's perfect deed: We, Your servants, bring the worship Not of voice alone, but heart; Consecrating to Your purpose Every gift which You impart.

As we worship, grant us vision, Till your love's revealing light In its height and depth and greatness Dawns upon our quickened sight, Making known the needs and burdens Your compassion bids us bear, Stirring us to ardent service, Your abundant life to share.
